content: these **holly leaf and berry appliques** are a cute christmas embellishment idea the pattern comes in 3 sizes *see below for more info* use these holly appliques as christmas ornaments or to decorate your christmas gift tags make magnets and diy christmas cards **materials** any yarn with the appropriate hook tapestry needle **size** the pattern comes in 3 sizes small medium and large with dk weight cotton yarn and a 3 0-mm hook your leaves will measure * small 0 9 by 0 5 2 3 cm by 1 3 cm * medium 1 4 by 0 9 3 5 cm by 2 3 cm * large 2 by 1 2 5 cm by 3 cm **gauge** not important for this pattern **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
